title: Only One Person Has a Different View of the World - Novel Updates
tags: Depictions of Cruelty   Fantasy World   Male Protagonist   R-15   Sword And Magic
author: 志生野柱
description:
A common medieval fantasy world. A fantasy world of swords and magic.
A knight protects the country, and an adventurer opens up the unknown. There are elves, dwarves, dragons, and demons. Such a common, usual world.
Philip Carter, a country boy abducted by a cult, was turned into a dubious ritual offering-knowing everything and giving up.

The story of a helpless and worthless boy who lives in a bubble-like world.>
